## Question 1: 

What are the results for the following code?
```{r, eval=FALSE}
(1==2)|(3==3)
(pi>3) & (0>=0)
```

1. T, F
2. F, T
3. _T, T_
4. F, F


*** .hint
Recall the logic operation rules 

*** .explanation
3==3 is T, "|" is "or"

pi>3 is T, and 0>=0 is T
